about_the_game:
"Suffice to say, this book is more than just a lovely gallery. What you have here is a compilation of the struggles and accomplishments we've made within the last two years of production. Despite being pushed out of their comfort zones, our artists rose to the occasion and faced the challenges head-on. We failed, we learned, we improved, and we tried again. We adopted a "rinse and repeat" mantra until we found the dynamic, lush, and gorgeous style we were looking for.

This is the art that you now all see in The Letter." -An excerpt from the foreword

--------------------------

Take a sneak peek into The Letter's production with this 185-paged digital artbook! Whether you're a fan of the game or a fellow developer, you'll surely enjoy and learn from the thoughts and experiences we've shared in this book!

Disclaimer: The artbook contains major spoilers. It is advisable that you finish at least 1 playthrough of the game before reading.

Features:

  • 185 pages discussing the evolution of the game's art and production process.
  • Several insider information/trivias about the game that we only disclosed here!
  • 3x Exclusive Wallpapers (3840x2160).

You can find the artbook inside your Steam game folder.
